thread.title: Cumbria Police funding cut by £26m
thread.title_full: Cumbria Police funding cut by £26m - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Cumbria Police funding cut by £26m
text:
Policing in Cumbria is under threat, and a "degraded service" could be inevitable, according to the force's Chief Constable.
Hannah McNulty has this report on proposals for cuts of £26 million, and the Chief Constable's scathing response:
Play video You can watch ITV Border's extended interview with the Chief Constable of Cumbria Police, here:
